text: Sano wandu waakuwa ali nkwalandanya achimmasyeto wao ni migongo (ja achimama wao pa chiwako changawa nkutenda nao soni ulombela), kaneko ni kuusyausya yawawecheteyo; basi agopole kapolo nkanaiche mwakwayana (ni achiwammakwaowo), jalakweji ni (misyungu ja Allah) jankuwundidwa najo, sano Allah abali syosope sya yankutenda awele Jwaasimanya chenene
